ruleToc.chapterList: @js:let f,c,d=chapter.resultJson.data.vodName+' ',p=[];chapter.resultJson.data.playerList.map(function(e,i){f=i % 2 === 0?{bg:'#b24e4e52',co:'#dd524dd6'}:{bg:'#0d83ca52',co:'#0d83cad6'};if(e.playerName.includes('一起看')){f.bg='linear-gradient(233deg,#e2bc81,#c8944e)';f.co='#ffffffe6';}e.playerName=e.playerName.replace('一起看APP','默认高速');c=chapter.resultJson.data.playerList.length>1?'<font style="margin-left:1em;color:'+f.co+';font-size:12px;padding:4px 8px;background:'+f.bg+';border-radius:4px">'+e.playerName+'</font>':'';e.epList.map(function(i){p.push({u:i.epId,n:d+i.epName+c});});if(e.epList.length>200){chapter.resultJson.data.playerList.splice(1)}});p;
